statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"Job Location":"Georgia,ga","Job Id":"21050127","Job Company Name":"Numbi Ninja","Job Posted time":"10 minutes","Job Description":"UI Automation Tester","Job Title":"SDET4610","Job Type":"Part time"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("aplication/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
